name: Rotato
description: An easy-to-use 3D mockup generator and animator for showcasing mobile app/web designs
introduction:
## Tool Description

Rotato is a specialized app that allows designers to quickly create high-quality 3D mockups of their app or website designs on various device models like iPhones, Android phones, laptops etc. It offers a simple drag-and-drop interface to import designs and animate them in a realistic 3D environment.

## Key Features

- Massive library of over 30 pre-made, photorealistic 3D device models
- Ability to fully customize device colors, materials, backgrounds etc.
- Advanced camera controls to adjust perspective, depth of field etc.
- Animation timeline for creating app preview videos
- Figma plugin for direct import of designs

## Use Cases

- Creating eye-catching 3D mockup images/videos to showcase app/website UIs
- Building impressive product demos, portfolio pieces, pitch decks
- Generating high-quality assets for App Store listings or marketing materials
